title: Subtraction
text: Subtract $$x^2$$ from both sides, and we get $$y^2=1-x^2$$.
speech: Subtract  x squared  from both sides, and we get  y squared, is equal to, 1 minus x squared .

title: Sqrt
text: Solve $$y$$ in this equation, and we get $$y=\sqrt{1-x^2}$$ and $$-\sqrt{1-x^2}$$.
speech: Solve  y  in this equation, and we get  y, is equal to the square root of 1 minus x squared end root  and , negative the square root of 1 minus x squared end root .

title: Explanation of the result
text: We get two outputs corresponding to the same input, so this relationship cannot be represented as a single function.
